Arfan's research interests include cancer epidemiology, gene-environment interactions and the molecular basis of age-related decline. Arfan has experience designing and implementing research projects, conducting statistical data analysis and working in resource-poor settings. Aside from his emphasis in academic research, he enjoys promoting the arts and loves teaching, backpacking and dance choreography.
